author: James Ganley
title: Summer Today, Fall This Weekend

Summer Today, Fall This Weekend
It will feel like Summer on Friday before a big cool down arrives this weekend
It will feel like summer for a day on Friday with highs in the low 80s and plenty of sunshine.Temperatures drop into the mid 50s overnight with a cold front moving in/It returns to Fall this weekend with highs in the low 60s on Saturday and Sunday with a chance for rain.
MILWAUKEE —
It will feel like summer for a day on Friday with highs in the low 80s and plenty of sunshine.

Temperatures drop into the mid 50s overnight with a cold front moving in/
It returns to Fall this weekend with highs in the low 60s on Saturday and Sunday with a chance for rain.
